short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that removes ads and "featured" products from search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is my attempt at an extension that removes pair-for ads on the
second-hand e-commerce site "Dubizzle.eg", Furthermore this add-on makes
it that you browsing and shopping experience is smooth and promotion
free.
This add-on works by scanning the HTML code of the webpage and removing
unwanted adds, the add-on, in no way, shape, or form, has access to you
personal information or browsing activity.
For extra validation check out the source code for yourself on
https://github.com/Mido3152/Dubizzle.eg-Ad-Remover .
